projects.name: Stock-it-app
projects.description: A simple inventory management application built with Electron, React, and TypeScript.

projects.name: Nigeria Tax Calculator
projects.description: A mobile application to calculate personal income tax in Nigeria.” game. The game goes like this: A user is asked a question in the form: “Would you rather [option A] or [option B] ?”. Answering 'neither' or 'both' is against the rules.

projects.name: Evolym-website
projects.description: This is an e-commerce and blog platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Vertical Search Engine
projects.description: A vertical search engine for students who want to apply for postgraduate research studies and look for potential supervisors at a UK university(Imperial, lancaster and coventry university)
